subject: URGENT: Contract redline needed by EOD
bodyText:
Hi team,

The investor counsel sent over the latest contract draft and needs feedback by end of day. Can you review clause 4.2 and confirm we're aligned on the revenue share adjustments?

Specifically, they're proposing:
- 15% revenue share on first $1M
- 12% on next $4M
- 10% thereafter

This differs from our initial proposal. Please review ASAP as we need to close this round by Friday.

Best,
Jane

subject: Re: Product demo follow-up
bodyText:
Hi there,

Thanks for the great demo yesterday! Our team was impressed with the platform's capabilities.

A few follow-up questions:
1. Can you send over the pricing for the Enterprise tier?
2. What's the typical implementation timeline?
3. Do you offer pilot programs?

We'd like to move forward with a pilot if possible. Can we schedule a call next week to discuss?

Thanks,
Sarah Chen
CTO, TechStartup

subject: Coffee next week?
bodyText:
Hey!

I'll be near your office on Wednesday morning. Could we find 20 minutes to sync on the pilot rollout?

Also wanted to discuss the Q4 roadmap and get your thoughts on the new ML features.

Let me know what works!

Tyler

subject: [GitHub] Security alert: dependency vulnerability detected
bodyText:
GitHub found a security vulnerability in one of your dependencies.

Package: axios
Severity: High
Patched version: >=1.6.0
Current version: 1.5.2

Recommended action: Update to version 1.6.0 or later.

View security advisory: https://github.com/advisories/...

subject: Code review requested: Feature/voice-integration
bodyText:
Hi,

I've completed the voice integration feature and it's ready for review.

PR: #456
Changes:
- Implemented Whisper API integration
- Added voice command processing
- Created audio streaming pipeline
- Updated tests

All tests are passing and I've tested locally with various audio formats.

Could you review when you get a chance? We're hoping to merge by EOW.

Thanks!
Alex

subject: Weekly AI market digest
bodyText:
This week in AI:

1. OpenAI announces new reasoning models
2. Google launches Gemini 2.0 with multimodal capabilities
3. EU passes new AI regulation framework
4. Anthropic raises $2B at $40B valuation

Read the full digest at our website...

subject: Action Required: Benefits enrollment deadline Oct 15
bodyText:
Dear Team,

This is a reminder that open enrollment for 2026 benefits closes on October 15th.

If you haven't already:
1. Review your current benefits
2. Consider any life changes
3. Submit your selections in the HR portal

Failure to enroll by the deadline will result in default coverage.

Questions? Contact HR at benefits@company.com

Best,
HR Team

subject: Re: NDA for Project Phoenix
bodyText:
Team,

I've reviewed the NDA and have a few minor comments:

1. Section 2.3 - Suggest extending confidentiality period to 5 years
2. Section 4.1 - Need to add carve-out for publicly available information
3. Section 6 - Jurisdiction should be Delaware

Otherwise looks good. Once these changes are made, we can proceed with signatures.

Please send the revised version when ready.

Mike Johnson
Partner, Legal Firm LLP

subject: Your monthly usage report - September 2025
bodyText:
Your September usage summary:

Compute hours: 1,247 (↑ 15% from August)
Storage: 2.4TB (↑ 8% from August)
Bandwidth: 890GB (↓ 3% from August)

Total charges: $3,456.78

View detailed breakdown in your dashboard.

Thank you for using CloudService!

subject: Urgent: Server outage affecting production
bodyText:
URGENT - PLEASE ACKNOWLEDGE

We're experiencing a critical outage on production servers.

Impact:
- API response times degraded by 10x
- Some users experiencing timeouts
- Database connections intermittent

Incident started: 4:15 PM EST
Severity: P1

Engineering team is investigating. Please join the incident bridge: meet.company.com/incident

Will send updates every 30 minutes.

Jennifer Lee
VP Engineering
